long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you remember your favourite dialogues from all those movies and tv series ?
Every new tab will open some famous movie quotes  .
"Welcome to the real world. It sucks. You're gonna love it! " (Friends tv series)
Also ,This will  help to get rid of chrome default new tab with thumbnails.
